sentences.sentence: Call it the piggy bank strategy.
If you drop that into a piggy bank and then once a year put $1,434 in a savings account at 1% interest rate, you will have your trip money.
sentences.translation: 如果你把钱存到存钱罐里，然后每年把1434美元存到一个利率为1%的储蓄账户里，你就会有旅行资金了。

sentences.sentence: If you drop that into a piggy bank and then once a year put $1,434 in a savings account at 1% interest rate after-tax, you will have your trip money.
sentences.translation: 如果你把钱放进储钱罐里，然后每年按税后1%的利率把1434美元存入储蓄账户，你就有了旅行的钱。
